body_html:
Have you tried setting your inter_op_parallelism_threads to 1? Some core TensorFlow operations on multi-core CPU will be non-deterministic by default, due to parallel execution being enabled by default.

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41233635/meaning-of-inter-op-parallelism-threads-and-intra-op-parallelism-threads
body_text:
Have you tried setting your inter_op_parallelism_threads to 1? Some core TensorFlow operations on multi-core CPU will be non-deterministic by default, due to parallel execution being enabled by default.
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41233635/meaning-of-inter-op-parallelism-threads-and-intra-op-parallelism-threads
body:
Have you tried setting your `inter_op_parallelism_threads` to 1? Some core TensorFlow operations on multi-core CPU will be non-deterministic by default, due to parallel execution being enabled by default. 

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41233635/meaning-of-inter-op-parallelism-threads-and-intra-op-parallelism-threads
